Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: joshimba04
Reviews.Content: I have installed 50+ Digital Watchdog DVR's.  NO PROBLEMS!!! The flex is simple to set up, easy to navigate, and is a great buy.  I highly recommend any DW DVR.  I especially love the smart phone APP for apple products because it has the capture button, once you see live streaming and want to take a picture of that screen hit the capture button, and it saves the photo to your phone.  Plus the APP is FREE.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Jeters
Reviews.Content: We've installed dozens of these units and they have proven to reliable, affordable and simple to use. One of the biggest issues we have with the cheaper DVR s is the lack of DDNS function and if it is present they drop off way to much!  Neither us or our customer can afford frequent service calls to re-initiate the network or have the DDNS go down while they are away on holidays.

Reviews.Title: easy and works well with mobile
Reviews.Author: T. Gordon
Reviews.Content: Not bad for the money. I wished it had a little higher resolution while recording constant. Easy set-up and easy use. Works well with iOs and Droid.

Reviews.Title: I would not recommend if you need a reliable security system
Reviews.Author: chicoulockit
Reviews.Content: We have tried EVERY WAY POSSIBLE TO BACK THIS UP BECAUSE IT ONLY HOLDS ABOUT 30 DAYS AND THEY MAKE IT IMPOSSIBLE TO BACK IT UP! IM PRETTY PISSED WITH THE PRODUCT, DO NOT BUYY!! BUY SOMEONE WHO ACTUALLY THINKS BEFORE MANUFACTURING A PRODUCT. SECURITY DVR'S ARE SO THAT YOU CAN GO BACK AND SEE WHAT HAPPENED, BUT ONLY 30 DAYS- COMON!

ProductInfo.Features:
Sixteen (16) Camera inputs, 1TB Hard Drive
Advanced H.264 Linux Embedded DVR, Multiplex-Live, Playback, Recording, Backup, Network. 120fps at D1 recording.
Support 3G Phone; Free App for Blackberry, iPhone, Android, Tablets, Mac Compatible Remote Software
USB 2.0 Built-in for Mouse Operation, Backup, and Firmware Upgrade, USB Mouse, IR Remote Control GUI
Web-Based Client w/ Multi-User Access, Automatic Private IP Addressing, Simple & Free DDNS Support, NTP (Network Time Protocol), Network Bandwidth Control, Text or E-mail Event Notifications with Snapshots
ProductInfo.Name: Digital Watchdog VMAX-FLEX Digital Video Recorder, 16 Channel, 1TB
